topic.body:
RubyCocoa 0.4 features:
* RubyCocoa framework was revived. And most implementation (even a Ruby part) was included in RubyCocoa framework. It will be easy to distribute RubyCocoa application.
* Supported Ruby 1.7
Relocated home page of RubyCocoa to ((<URL:http://rubycocoa.sf.net/&bt;)) from ((<URL:http://www.imasy.or.jp/~hisa/mac/rubycocoa/<)).
